title: 4, 7, 8 and 14 and 14A(1)of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and
heading: 4. Schedule 1 to the Principal Regulations is amended in PART A thereof,
text_raw:
4. Schedule 1 to the Principal Regulations is amended in PART A thereof, 

by the insertion of the following approved institution: 

“Technological University of the Shannon: Midlands and Midwest” 

Amendment of Article 5 of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 4 schedule 1 principal regulation amended part thereof insertion following approved institution technological university shannon midland midwest amendment article 5 principal regulation

title: 4, 7, 8 and 14 and 14A(1)of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and
heading: 5. Article 5 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertions of the
text_raw:
5. Article 5 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertions of the 

following article: 

“5(4) A child of a Turkish national in respect of whom the Minister for Justice 
has granted a permission to reside and who, in accordance with Article 9 of 
Decision 1/80 of the Association Council made pursuant to the Ankara 
Agreement 1963, is residing with their parents, who are or have been legally 
employed within the State and can satisfy the conditions relating to employment 
laid down in Articles 6 and 7 of Decision 1/80.” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [535] 3 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 

20 October, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 October, 2021. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [535]

title: 4, 7, 8 and 14 and 14A(1)of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations are an amendment to the existing principal Regulations (S.I. 
No. 132 of 2021) which prescribe "approved institutions" and other matters for 
the purposes of the Student Support Act 2011. These Regulations may be cited 
as the Student Support (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [535] 5
